title: Can Google’s Criticism of Microsoft’s Cloud Computing Practices Drive Change?
description: In a landscape dominated by the race for supremacy in cloud computing, Alphabet’s Google Cloud has intensified its criticism of Microsoft’s practices, accusing its rival of orchestrating a monopolistic agenda detrimental to the advancement of emerging technologies. Amid escalating tensions, Google Cloud’s Vice President, Amit Zavery, voiced concerns over Microsoft’s alleged attempts to consolidate control […]

title: A Breakthrough in AI-Based Emotional Support
description: Better mental health is becoming possible in a society where technology rules. This is due to a recent breakthrough. Hefei Comprehensive National Science Center and Hefei University of Technology researchers have unveiled EmoAda, a cutting-edge artificial intelligence (AI) platform that offers basic emotional assistance to those under stress or depression. In tackling the mental health […]

title: Crypto eyes $2.5t market cap, new AI coin targets $11m in presale
description: With the global crypto market capitalization eyeing the $2.5 trillion mark, analysts are bullish on Bitcoin and InQubeta
